sourcesContent:
/** @format */

export const CVDesc = [
	'French native, Yannick received his formal culinary training in a renouned Michelin star restaurant in Lille at the age of 16; apprentice in Pastry, Yannick has developed a profound culinary knowledge in the kitchen and pastry division, before his first chef de cuisine position at Regal Kowloon in Hong Kong at the age of 27.',
	'Chef Yannick brings over 30 years experience, with exposure working in Europe, Asia and Middle East. That allows chef Yannick to develop extensive knowledge in Asian and International cuisine, yet Classical, Modern and with a Gourmet flair.',
	'Currently based as "in house chef" at Morgan Stanley Hong Kong since 2008 up to April 2022, chef Yannick works as Executive Chef managing his team in a corporate environment, including various nature of events for example business lunches, summits, conferences for both internal and external events covering the whole APAC region.',
];

export const CVApproach = [
	'Client first, understand the objectives, core values and vision of the company.',
	'Adhere to & follow the principle of think, do, measure, correct & improve continuously.',
	'Result-oriented, adopt actions to circumstances to obtain the best possible results.',
	'Create a dynamic structure in the kitchen, fresh seasonal products, quality processes & resources.',
	'Hands-on, coaching & leading a team meticulously to bring out team members best skills / team building / training and managing budgets and targets.',
];

export const CVFuture = [
	'Preferably based in Hong Kong or the APAC region overseeing sites in a wellbeing working environment such as Corporate, Hospitality, Sports & Leisure sites.',
	'Base lines objectives and expectations of offering first class meals with the ambition to scientific approach to creating food with nutritional values and customers needs.',
];

export const ExpItems = [
	{
		title: 'Executive Chef',
		loc: 'MORGAN STANLEY, Corporate Facilities & Services - HONG KONG',
		period: 'Dec. 2008 - Apr. 2022 (13 years and 4 months)',
		img: 'ms-HKG.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.morganstanley.com/about-us/global-offices/asia-pacific/hong-kong',
		cert: ['morgan01.png', 'morgan02.png'],
		desc: "Managing the in-house culinary team of 22 chefs for Morgan Stanley office – ICC building 15 floors in total from L30 to L47 & L86. Approximately 3,000 Morgan Stanley employees Creating all food offer for the daily food operation, on-site production featuring cuisines from Chinese, Japanese, Indian, Western & South-East Asian. Supervise and ensure all the service provided do meet client’s standards and expectations at all times for all outlets operating for Breakfast, Lunch, Afternoon-tea & Dinner. On going culinary theme promotions featuring different cuisines to keep good patronage with the total 1,800 transactions daily. Coordinating with 2 teams to operate the amenities as follow: Outlet team in charge of “Mosaicc” restaurant, the coffee bar & lounge, 2 Trader’s pantries, one floor of corporate service (L86) Catering team in charge of team in charge the EXECUTIVE FLOOR and CONFERENCE CENTER Create numerous professional & robust food portfolio and deliver for internal and external business, corporate events. Executive Floor, offers numerous business set lunch - cocktail reception - buffet  – bento set menus & various cuisines - 16 meeting rooms 12 Training rooms 1 amphitheater accommodating up to 120 attendees",
		ach: [
			"2009 – Pre-opening phase, plan & implement the F&B budgets, recruiting, training, HSE standard and menu offers.",
			"2010 – Plan and design our pastry room",
			"2010 / 2020 – Part of annual Asia Pacific & annual Summit conference for Morgan Stanley, Hong Kong & Singapore",
			"2010 / 2020 – Coordinate corporate events with celebrity chefs Hong Kong, China, India, France & Singapore",
			"2010 / 2020 – continuously support with Sodexo & Morgan Stanley the WWF “sustainable fisheries & sourcing, the reduction of our carbon footprint and sustainability resources program.",
			"2011 – Part of the exchange Culinary Program for Sodexo PRESTIGE, PARIS (Microsoft / Canal+ / MEDEF)",
			"2011 – Lead staff development - pastry chef successfully obtained the certificate of Pastry from GERMANY, VTC HK",
			"2012 / 2018 – Part of the Sodexo Global chef program with major clients in SHANGHAI, BOSTON, MANILA (Johnson & Johnson / Microsoft / Fordham…)",
			"2010 SINGAPORE, coordinate corporate event with  Jean-Francois PIEGE",
			"2010 Staff development; team member participate at SODEXO World Class Chef program in Boston, US",
			"2011 Coordinating with Pierre GAGNAIRE VIP menu Lunch for 350 & Dinner menu for 20 guests, SINGAPORE ·",
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Executive Sous-Chef',
		loc: 'Hotel, SHERATON Fota Island Golf, Resort & SPA - Cork, IRELAND',
		period: 'May 2006 - Nov 2008 (2 years and 6 months)',
		img: 'fota-IRE.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.fotaisland.ie/',
		cert: ['sheraton.png'],
		desc: "In - charge of the daily operations for Breakfast, Lunch and dinner and menu planning for the two restaurants, the Amber Lounge & Bar, Banquet faciulities up to 250 covers and Room service of the Outlets; In charge of the operation durring the absence of the Executive Chef.",
		ach: [
			"Pre – Opening team of the kitchens – hotel consisting of 130 rooms & Launch of the Grand opening of the biggest SPA in Ireland",
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staffing of 25 chefs & 7 stewarding",
			"Ensure the kitchen operation is adhering to the HACCP system",
			"Recruitment and Training new staff members",
			"Develop menu concept base on Medditerranean cooking style",
			"Play part of the smooth running operation of Fine dinning restaurant",
			"Food cost target at 28.4% and achieved at 27.5% in 2006"
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Cuisine',
		loc: 'Hotel & Resort, Arabian Court - ONE & ONLY Royal Mirage - Dubaï, UAE',
		period: 'Nov. 2002 - Nov.2005 (3 years)',
		img: 'OneOnly-DBI.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.oneandonlyresorts.com/royal-mirage',
		cert: ['mirage01.png', 'mirage02.png', 'mirage03.png'],
		desc: "In - charge of the daily operations and menu planning of the Arabian Court kitchens including the interactive show kitchen ‘‘Rotisserie’’ restaurant, the room service operation consisting of 170 rooms, The ‘‘ Samovar’’ lounge and banqueting, production accommodating up to 400 guests",
		ach: [
			"Pre – Opening team of the kitchens – hotel",
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staffing of 25 chefs",
			"Daily average cover for breakfast, lunch & dinner is approximately 800",
			"Implementation of new menu, concentrating on product, taste, texture and presentation",
			"Responsibilities include all aspect of kitchen administration, staff training, maintaining food cost",
			"Budget objectives were achieved every fiscal month / year, through careful planning & forecast on budget given and by optimising on product usage and efficiency",
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Cuisine',
		loc: 'Restaurant Margaux - Hotel SHANGRI-LA Jakarta - INDONESIA',
		period: 'Apr. 2001 - Apr. 2002 (1 year)',
		img: 'shangri-la-IDN.jpeg',
		link: 'https://www.shangri-la.com/jakarta/shangrila/',
		cert: ['shangrila01.png', 'shangrila02.png'],
		desc: "The cuisine at ‘‘Margaux’’ frames contemporary French and an Asian twist. Lunch offers a semi-buffet with elegant cold and hot appetizers. The main dishes are served a la carte with a choice of varieties of oversee products. Dinner is more refine and cater to up market clientele; a touch of French and Asian influence cuisine.",
		ach: [
			"Re – Opening team of the kitchen – restaurant april 2001",
			"Sales calls appointed with major French companies in Jakarta",
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staffing of 10 chefs",
			"Daily average cover for lunch & dinner is approximately 80",
			"Responsibilities include all aspect of kitchen administration, staff training, maintaining food cost, inventory control and re-enforce hygiene policies",
			"Implementation of new ingredients and the projection towards improving the quality and standard of the product",
			"Assisted in Banquet Operations catering for 10 covers to 3000 covers."
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Cuisine',
		loc: 'French Restaurant & Wine bar - Hotel REGAL Kowloon - HONG KONG',
		period: 'Jan. 2000 - Mar. 2001 (1 year and 3 months)',
		img: 'regal-HKG.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.regalhotel.com/mobile/regal-kowloon-hotel/en/home/home.html',
		cert: ['regal01.png', 'regal02.png'],
		desc: "A fine dining French restaurant featuring regional and historical french cuisine and Asian influenced dishes. The restaurant is ajacent to a wine bar featuring 400 ready-to-drink wines, the biggest collection in Asia, as well, with a refined banquet area",
		ach: [
			"Management and organisation of the kitchens with a staffing of 8 chefs",
			"Daily average cover for lunch & dinner is approximately 80",
			"Responsibilities include all aspect of kitchen administration, staff training, maintaining food cost",
			"Implementation of new menu, concentrating on local taste, traditional dishes and presentation",
			"Support Master Chefs’ Promotion and Wine Makers dinners from different parts of the world",
		],
		subAch: [
			"Toscana Food and Wine dinner promotion",
			"Australian Food and Wine dinner promotion",
			"Champagne region Food and Wine dinner promotion",
			"Californian Food and Wine dinner promotion",
			"Cuban Food, Wine and Cigar promotion",
		]
	},
	{
		title: 'Sous-Chef & Pastry Leader',
		loc: 'Relais & Châteaux - LUCKNAM PARK - Bath, UK',
		period: 'Apr. 1998 - Dec. 1999 (1 year and 8 months)',
		img: 'lucknam-UK.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.lucknampark.co.uk/',
		cert: ['lucknam.png'],
		desc: "Countryside ‘‘Relais & Chateaux’’ property with 3 F&B outels, fine dinning restaurant featuring modern and contemporary French cuisine",
		ach: [
			"Pre – Opening team of the kitchen - hotel",
			"Gain our first star Michelin Award in 1998 with chef Trevor Brooks, executive chef",
			"Undertake responsibilities of sections in absence of the sous chef",
			"In-charge of the daily operation of the pastry department and menu planning",
			"Expertise in the sauce section",
		],
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Partie Sauce & Pastry',
		loc: 'MULBERRY Boutique hotel - Charlton House & SPA - Bath, UK G',
		period: 'Apr. 1997 - Apr. 1998 (1 year)',
		highlight: '1 Michelin star, 3 rosettes « AA » Guide',
		img: 'mulbery-UK.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.bannatyne.co.uk/hotel/charlton-house',
		cert: ['charlton.png'],
		desc: "Opening of the ‘‘Mulberry company’’ Boutique hotel property in 1997, consist of 17 rooms, 3 F&B outlets with the fine dining restaurant and the Conservatory lounge and room service.",
		ach: [
			"In-charge of the daily production of the sauce section and butchery department",
			"Daily menu planning",
			"Responsibilities include re-enforce of the HAACP method, ordering",
		],
	},
	{
		title: 'Chef de Partie Rôtisserie & Pastry',
		loc: 'Country house The Royal Berkshire - HILTON - Ascot, UK',
		period: 'Feb.1996 - Mar. 1997 (1 year and 1 month)',
		highlight: '3 rosettes « AA »',
		img: 'berkshire-UK.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.exclusive.co.uk/royal-berkshire/',
		cert: ['berkshire.png'],
		desc: "Countryside hotel with 23 bedrooms, the restaurant accommodate 80 customers including 4-function rooms offering a fine dinning A la Carte and Daily Menu"
	},
	{
		title: 'Commis Chef & Pastry',
		loc: "Restaurant « À L'Huîtrière » Lille, FRANCE",
		period: 'Aug.1992 - Mar. 1995 (2 years and 7 months)',
		highlight: '1 Michelin star',
		img: 'huitre-lille.jpg',
		link: 'https://www.yourlittleblackbook.me/en/huitriere-lille-oyster-bar-rijsel/',
		cert: ['huitriere.png'],
		desc: "This is a unique fishmonger’s gallery and well-reputed restaurant in France with over 100 years history, located in the centre of the city. With a meeting room accommodating up to 70 customers, And the restaurant serves 80 to 90 covers daily, offering an a la Carte and Seasonal Gourmet Menu."
	},
	{
		title: 'Commis Chef & Pastry Trainee',
		loc: 'Restaurant “Le Crabe Tambour” Cambrai, FRANCE',
		period: 'July 1989 - Jun. 1992 (3 years)',
		img: 'huitriere-lille.jpg',
		link: 'https://lille.guide-ville.com/en/lhuitriere-restaurant-fish-oyster-bar-2/',
	},
];

	"All floor pantries replaced disposable cutleries as well as paper plates, bamboo chopsticks, wooden stirrers.",
	"No aluminium trays to be served for catering event order.",
	"Support with MS by provide paper straws and replaced all plastic straws, or upon request to offer in order to less usage of straws in Juice bar and Coffee Bar cold beverage (Starbucks). Those practise also applied in Catering major event, HK Summit. ",
	"Started New Waste classification Café and extended to Kitchen waste classification in 2019",
]
